name: Tempkin's Time Trouble
description:
Father Time has fallen asleep. While he slumbers, the magical Time Zone is being invaded by the Temporal Tricksters! You are a time fairy named Tempkin, and it's up to you to save the day!

Tempkin's Time Trouble was created for 48 Secret Jam that took place on April 20 - 22, 2018. It was created in 48 hours, and among the Topics given, the ones that this game incorporates are Deja Vu and Unconventional Weapons.
